item.Q:
Write the character:
healthy; peaceful; abundant; surname; see also 糠
item.A:
kāng
健康 jiànkāng health; healthy

item.Q:
Write the character:
year; years old; (a measure word)
item.A:
traditional: 歲
suì
万岁 (萬歲) wànsuì live long; wish a long life

item.Q:
Write the character:
to guard; to observe (the ritual)
item.A:
shǒu
遵守 zūnshǒu comply with; respect (an agreement)

item.Q:
Write the character:
old (opposite of new); former
item.A:
traditional: 舊
jiù
仍旧 (仍舊) réngjiù still (remaining); to remain (the same); yet

item.Q:
Write the character:
cards; game pieces; signboard; plate; tablet
item.A:
牌 (strokes unavailable)
pái
招牌 zhāopái placard

item.Q:
Write the character:
lucky; abbr. for Jilin 吉林 province in northeast China; surname
item.A:
jí
吉林 Jílín Jilin province (Kirin) in northeast China, abbr. 吉, capital 長春|长春

item.Q:

invoke; pray to; wish; to express good wishes; surname
item.A:
zhù

lion
item.A:

shī

item.A:

fàn
